overview: IN 1860, A YOUNG GOVERNESS, EVA GREENWOOD JOURNEYS TO A SMALL TOWN IN ALBERTA, CANADA TO KILL THE MAN SHE BELIEVES IS RESPONSIBLE FOR HER MOTHER’S UNTIMELY DEATH. A FEMALE-DRIVEN REVENGE FILM, IN THE STYLE OF A WESTERN CALLED ‘THE STONEKILLER".
tagline: A FEMALE-DRIVEN REVENGE FILM, IN THE STYLE OF A WESTERN
title: The Stonekiller
